headline: Assessing Amphenol (APH) After A 124% One-Year Surge In Share Price
summary: If you are wondering whether Amphenol's share price still makes sense after a strong run, this article walks through what the numbers are actually saying about its valuation. The stock most recently closed at US$154.39, with returns of 6.4% over 7 days, 14.1% over 30 days, 10.5% year to date, 124.1% over 1 year and 301.6% over 3 years. These figures naturally raise questions about how much future upside or downside is already reflected in the price. Recent coverage has focused on Amphenol's...
